thread.title: Facebook down: Problems at social network send users into FRENZY as they can't access news feed
thread.title_full: Facebook down: Problems at social network send users into FRENZY as they can't access news feed

author: Jeff Parsons
title: Facebook down: Problems at social network send users into FRENZY as they can't access news feed
text:
Who's been on your profile recently? (Photo: Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Facebook is suffering sporadic outages across the UK leaving people unable to access their news feed or load other pages. 
There's been no official announcement from Facebook, but Mirror Tech has independently confirmed there are issues regarding the loading of the news feed. 
Users took to Twitter to check on the status of social network under the hashtag #Facebookdown. 
And as news started to spread, more and more people used their 140 characters to vent frustration at being unable to get onto Facebook. Read More 
According to the DownDetector website , which monitors major network outages, parts of Europe as well as the majority of south east England has suffered from the crash. Read More Instagram down: Users claim they are unable to post photos and videos The map showing Facebook's current outage (Photo: DownDetector) 
The cause of the outage has yet to be confirmed. Mirror Tech has contacted Facebook for a comment. poll loading Do you care about Facebook crashing? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
